attr.title: TinySTG
attr.desc:
TinyArcade's shooting game 'TinySTG' 
Operate fighter to avoid bullet and shoot down enemy aircraft. The upper left is the score, the upper right is the high score, the lower left is the remaining machine, and the lower right is the number of the remaining bombers. If you destroy an enemy aircraft, items may appear. The fighter will power up when you acquire the item.
